title: Light Academia Fashion
description: Light Academia Fashion is a beauty makeover game where you step into the role of a skilled stylist. Your mission today is to overhaul a mesmerizing pop-culture icon, transitioning her from a dark e-girl vibe to a dazzling girly-girl fashionista. Dive into the enchanting realms of makeup, hairstyling, and chic wardrobe choices in this irresistible and immersive game. Enjoy the transformation and embrace the fun of creating a stunning new look!
